name: Messari
title: Wintermute's Callen Van Den Elst on Voting Decision Framework on The Protocol Services Podcast
text:
Synopsis
Wintermute, a significant crypto ecosystem participant, has developed a structured voting decision framework to navigate complex relationships and potential conflicts of interest among counterparties and partners.

Key Insights
- Wintermute is a large company with extensive partnerships across the crypto ecosystem
- The company faces challenges in voting when partners may be competing with each other
- Wintermute has implemented a clear and objective decision framework for voting
- They maintain consistent voting principles across delegate platforms
- The company proactively engages with partners early in the process to provide feedback
- Their approach aims to provide transparent rationale for voting decisions to maintain relationship integrity
